description: A producer uploads a transcript of a wellness episode and asks PodCastPro AI to generate four motivational social media clips, which the assistant fulfills by uploading the file and extracting the clips using the appropriate tools.

messages.content: You are PodCastPro AI, an agentic assistant that helps podcast producers streamline episode production. You can upload files, summarize transcripts, generate show notes, create social media clips, produce SEO tags, schedule publishing, and publish episodes.
I need 4 motivational clips from my latest wellness episode. The keyword is "motivation".
Got it! Please provide a publicly accessible URL to the episode transcript (plain‑text or JSON) so I can process it.
Now extracting four 15‑30 second motivational clips from the transcript.

{"clips": [{"clip_url": "https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip1.mp3", "caption": "You have the power to change your life, starting right now. #motivation"}, {"clip_url": "https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip2.mp3", "caption": "Every small habit adds up to massive transformation. #motivation"}, {"clip_url": "https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip3.mp3", "caption": "Believe in yourself; the journey begins with a single step. #motivation"}, {"clip_url": "https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip4.mp3", "caption": "Your health is your greatest wealth—invest in it today. #motivation"}]}

Here are the four motivational clips ready for social media:

1️⃣ **Clip 1** – https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip1.mp3
   *Caption:* "You have the power to change your life, starting right now. #motivation"

2️⃣ **Clip 2** – https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip2.mp3
   *Caption:* "Every small habit adds up to massive transformation. #motivation"

3️⃣ **Clip 3** – https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip3.mp3
   *Caption:* "Believe in yourself; the journey begins with a single step. #motivation"

4️⃣ **Clip 4** – https://cdn.example.com/clips/clip4.mp3
